name: businessconnect-senegal
description: Plateforme de connexion professionnelle pour le Sénégal

scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:client
scripts.build:server: cd server && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:client: cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run dev" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
